attributes.action: Dissolve the current Parliament and Government and hold a General Election
attributes.additional_details: Calling a general election/vote of no confidence means we can get a Government which may actually be able to actually deal with Brexit and listen to the will of the people.
attributes.background: Given the absolute shambles that Brexit has turned out to be and that the current parliament in general does not speak for the people of this country anymore the only solution now is to dissolve Parliament and allow a General Election.
